LanguageData.ChimeraAssault.label: chimera assault
LanguageData.DevourerAssault.label: devourer assault
LanguageData.DevourerAssault.letterText: A swarm of huge gape-mawed monsters are attacking!\n\nThese creatures' jaws are massive enough to swallow a human whole. Keep your distance!
LanguageData.DevourerWaterAssault.label: devourer assault
LanguageData.DevourerWaterAssault.letterText: A swarm of huge gape-mawed monsters are attacking!\n\nThese creatures' jaws are massive enough to swallow a human whole. Keep your distance!
LanguageData.FleshbeastAttack.label: fleshbeast attack
LanguageData.FleshbeastAttack.letterText: The ground seems to be giving way. The sounds of writhing flesh and cracking bones can be heard from below.
LanguageData.FleshbeastAttack.letterTextPlural: Several sinkholes have started appearing. The sounds of writhing flesh and cracking bones can be heard from below.
LanguageData.FrenziedAnimals.label: frenzied animals
LanguageData.GhoulAttack.label: Ghoul attacking
LanguageData.GhoulAttack.letterText: A vicious humanoid ghoul is attacking!\n\nIt is intent on inhuman savagery and it cannot feel pain. Prepare to defend.
LanguageData.GorehulkAssault.label: gorehulk assault
LanguageData.GorehulkAssault.letterText: A group of monstrous, human-like abominations are attacking! Their bodies are ravaged by thick keratin spines which they can launch at a distance. However, their fleshy forms can do little damage at close range.
LanguageData.HateChanters.label: hate chanters
LanguageData.PsychicRitualSiege.label: psychic ritual siege
LanguageData.Revenant.label: revenant
LanguageData.ShamblerAssault.label: shambler assault
LanguageData.ShamblerSwarm.label: shambler swarm
LanguageData.ShamblerSwarmAnimals.label: shambler swarm
LanguageData.SightstealerArrival.label: sightstealer arrival
LanguageData.SightstealerSwarm.label: sightstealer swarm
LanguageData.SightstealerSwarm.letterText: Your colonists hear inhuman shrieks in the distance.\n\nSomething is out there.
LanguageData.SmallShamblerSwarm.label: shambler swarm
LanguageData.SmallShamblerSwarm.letterText: A small group of {0} shambling corpses is approaching. The inhuman force that animates them is fading, so they will collapse within a day.\n\nIf you can capture one, you can study it for anomaly knowledge. Otherwise, they might not notice you if you leave them alone.
